attributes.action: Save Woolworths from Closure and Create a People's Woolies...
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: ...saving 30,000 jobs and the 700 high street stores that have been serving the public for 99 years. The rescued People's Woolies will be a bulwark against the worst effects of the recession, employing local people, buying from local producers, easily reached by public transport, and providing the goods and services that people on low incomes need. We ask the government to do this as a matter of urgency, before Woolworths assets are stripped without any public benefit.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Save Woolworths from Closure and Create a People's Woolies..."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page19135


Prime Minister's Office
